title: Agilentâ€™s Net-Zero Emissions Targets Approved by the Science Based Targets Initiative - ESG Today
summary: Agilent Technologies Inc. announces near and long-term targets for reaching net-zero greenhouse gas emissions approved by the Science Based Targets initiative. The company aims to reduce absolute Scope 1, 2, and 3 GHG emissions significantly by both 2030 and 2050. Agilent has committed to sustainability initiatives and aims to help customers on their journey toward net zero.
green_innovation: TRUE The article discusses Agilent Technologies' efforts towards reducing greenhouse gas emissions and achieving net-zero targets, which align with environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE Agilent Technologies is implementing new targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions and advancing sustainability practices, which qualifies as a form of business innovation.
green_product: FALSE The article mentions products and lab solutions developed by Agilent Technologies that aim to reduce fossil fuel consumption and promote sustainability, but it does not provide specific details to classify them as green products.
green_process: TRUE The article mentions Agilent Technologies' initiatives to reduce emissions through investing in renewable energy sources, energy-efficient systems, and supply chain emissions reductions, demonstrating a commitment to green processes.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334516 - Analytical Laboratory Instrument Manufacturing, 541380 - Testing Laboratories, 541710 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences (except Nanotechnology and Biotechnology)
greenwashing: FALSE The article focuses on Agilent Technologies' concrete actions, commitments, and progress towards sustainability and reducing greenhouse gas emissions, demonstrating genuine efforts rather than greenwashing.

title: Allegro MicroSystems Completes Acquisition of Crocus Technology to Accelerate Innovation in TMR Sensing Technology - GlobeNewswire
summary: Allegro MicroSystems, Inc. completes the acquisition of Crocus Technology, strengthening its leading position in magnetic sensing technology.
